## Context.IContextMatchOptions.partialContextMatch property

If true, then conditions for which a corresponding values is not present in the context being matched will yield `undefined` instead of `NoMatch`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
partialContextMatch?: boolean;
```
